Hero.subtitle: Experience Traditional Turkish Cuisine with a Breathtaking View

About.title: About Us
About.description: Located in the heart of Sultanahmet, My Terrace Cafe Restaurant offers a unique dining experience where history meets flavor. Enjoy our authentic Turkish dishes while gazing at the mesmerizing view of the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: Can I come without a reservation?
FAQ.a1: Yes, we happily welcome walk-in guests. However, we recommend making a reservation as we can get quite busy, especially on weekends and in the evenings.
FAQ.q2: Are there vegetarian or gluten-free options on the menu?
FAQ.a2: Yes, our menu includes both vegetarian and gluten-free options. Please inform our team if you have any specific dietary requirements when ordering.
FAQ.q3: Which tables have the best view?
FAQ.a3: Our terrace floor stands out with its view of the sea and the historical peninsula. If you prefer a table with a view, simply mention it when making your reservation.
